Acceptance Criteria - Evidence of Qualification and personnel on-site.
Verifying Documents - Provide evidence where not previously provided or personnel change
Activity Description - Grading, sand. Equivalent, CBR
Acceptance Criteria - Comply with grading specification 100% pass 50mm at least 45% pass the 19mm sieve, and not more than 10% pass 425 micron sieve, CBR not less  than 40 and SE of not less than 40
Verifying Documents - Lab results to be supplied to Engineer
Activity Description - Bearing capacity of base
Acceptance Criteria - Bearing greater than 50 kPa
Verifying Documents - Inspection records available for review
Activity Description - Minimum to maximum range of trench width

Activity Description - Side slope of trench wall
Review of Retaining wall construction methodology
Activity Description - Engineer to comment where required, on the proposed construction methodology and review aborist assessment. Refer to drawing DRG-WA-21802 (C02)
Review Contractors supply of materials and QA documentation
Activity Description - Engineers rep to review QA documentation for timber piles, timber lagging, concrete and drainage backfill. Refer to drawing DRG-WA-21802 (C02)
Frequency - 10 days prior to beginning work
Verifying Documents - Provide evidence of material spec.
Confirmation / approval of any alternative materials
Activity Description - Engineers rep to confirm acceptance of any alternative materials requested by Contractor. Refer to drawing DRG-WA-21802 (C02)
Frequency - 10 days prior to beginning work
Verifying Documents - Provide specs of any alternative materials
Site visit to approve set out of retaining wall

Activity Description - Engineers rep to provide site inspection report sheet with photos of set out and description of site conditions encountered and any issues relating to design. Contractor to provide survey data co- ordinates for set out of four piles at pipe crossing location.  DRG- WA-21802 (C02)
Frequency - Once, after excavation to founding level and following survey set out

Activity Description - Engineers rep to witness installation of first two piles for each retaining wall and provide site visit report sheet detiling materials encountered, drill rate and any problems encountered and how they were resolved. Contractor shall record a pile log for all installed piles. This shall record the depth of hole, material encountered, comments on drill rate, if water was encountered and any temporary measures such as if pile casings were used, or any other issues that occured and how these were resolved. DRG-WA-21802 (C02)
Frequency - Once, after installation of first two piles on each side.
Inspection of DN375mm Stormwater pipe outlet
Activity Description - Contractor to provide photos of the pipe outlet location showing construction process of lagging and drainage material around the pipe. DRG-WA-21802 (C02)
Acceptance Criteria - Engineers acceptance (based on photos)
Inspection of retaining wall at OD813 wastewater pipe crossing location

Activity Description - Engineers rep to inspect pipe crossing location at each retaining wall prior to any drainage backfill being placed above the pipe. Engineers rep to provide site report sheet summarising inspection. DRG-WA-21802 (C02)
Frequency - Once, following installation of steel pipe crossing
Activity Description - Engineers rep to inspect lagging at 50% complete and summarise inspection in site report sheet. DRG-WA-21802
Frequency - Once following installation of lagging to 50% height
Inspection of drainage installation and determining subsoil outlet location

Activity Description - Engineers rep to inspect drainage backfill and determine the location of the subsoil drain outlet for each wall. Engineers rep to provide site report sheet summarising inspection. DRG-WA- 21802 (C02)
Frequency - Once, following drainage backfill for each wall
Final finished surface of site to be inspected
Activity Description - Engineers rep to conduct final inspection of retaining walls and provide photos with site report sheet. DRG-WA-21802 (C02)
Frequency - Following retaining wall construction and all reinstatement works
